characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as being direct and to-the-point, often using colloquial expressions.

options.description: Tends to be straightforward and concise in their communication
Often uses humor or subtlety to convey meaning

characteristics.name: Interest Focus
characteristics.description: Consistently focuses on Ethereum development and blockchain-related topics.

options.description: Tends to dive deep into technical aspects of their interests
Often engages with others in related communities

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Consistently interacts with others in a friendly and approachable manner, often using emojis.

options.description: Tends to be outgoing and engaging with others

characteristics.name: Personality Tone
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as being positive and enthusiastic.

options.description: Tends to focus on the bright side of things

characteristics.name: Value Alignment
characteristics.description: Consistently aligns their content with values such as community-building and knowledge-sharing.

options.description: Tends to prioritize the greater good

characteristics.name: Information Style
characteristics.description: Consistently presents information in a concise and easy-to-understand manner.

options.description: Tends to get straight to the point

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as being calm and composed, even in emotional situations.

options.description: Tends to bounce back from setbacks

characteristics.name: Intellectual Curiosity
characteristics.description: Consistently demonstrates a desire to learn and explore new topics.

options.description: Tends to ask questions and seek out knowledge
